title: That's entertainment
brief_description: For over 50 years MGM produced an array of dazzling stars and musical spectaculars. “That’s Entertainment” is a compilation of snippets and sequences from nearly 100 musicals, featuring great moments with most of the studio’s major singing and dancing stars, including Judy Garland, Fred Astaire, Eleanor Powell, Gene Kelly and many more.
